name: V.I.C.E Special Squad
description:
Project: V.I.C.E. ss1 Under Siege

To the Earth which regained peace, an unprecedented crisis has arrived. 

The unknown armies control by "Peacemaker" suddenly appeared in the City!! It's a gigantic Nano-creature which absorbs all resources and continues to destroy without stopping. 

In the meantime, Department of Defense will be faced too! 

People entrust their last hope into the squad fighter team call V.I.C.E.,  The Fugitive Task Force relentlessly tracks notorious criminals on the Bureau's Most Wanted list . 

buy me a Coffee: https://ko-fi.com/daydev/
